name: Overparity
description:
OVERPARITY

WASD: Movement
F : Shoot
E : Speak/Interact
SHIFT : Run
SPACE: Next Slide
L+(1-8): Load Scenes (1-8)

The year is 2038. Ocean life is at a rapid decline, with no slowing down in sight. An expert team of Marine Biologists and engineers have developed and built a state of the art facility to address this and reverse course. The name of this tower off the coast of the Florida Keys is Bion. The head of Bion is Dr. Moira, who recruits Sonny to investigate and research a mystical egg that was discovered from the depths of the oceans. While in possession, it causes an abrupt storm and awakens a new type of darkness.

Dien Duong - Designer, Programmer

Jenny Truong - Artist

Jordan Hall - Story, Designer

Micheal Jee - Programmer, Artist

Dori  Holly  - Sound Designer

Jacob Vallecillo - Programmer, Sound Designer
